prompts: Create a dinosaur-like Pokemon that can harness the power of rocks and darkness.
Show me a fierce, bipedal Pokemon with a green body and spiky features.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature and dominates the battlefield.
Design a robust Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a rocky appearance.
Generate a Pokemon with sharp claws and a menacing roar, ready for battle.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a unique dark color palette.
Give me a representation of a Pokemon that can create earthquakes and intimidate opponents.
